channel.title: Primes on Warframe Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Primes on Warframe Blog

item.title: How To Get Pyrana Prime
item.description: Hey guys. And the Pyrana Prime along with Limbo Prime and Destreza Prime﻿ have arrived in Warframe. Today I’ll be showing you which relics you’ll need to farm to get Pyrana Prime and where you can farm these relics.

item.title: How To Get Limbo Prime
item.description: Hey guys. And the Limbo Prime along with Destreza Prime and Pyrana Prime﻿ have arrived in Warframe. Today I’ll be showing you which relics you’ll need to farm to get Limbo Prime and where you can farm these relics.

item.title: How To Get Ember Prime
item.description: Hey guys. And the Ember Prime along with Sicarus Prime and Glaive Prime﻿ have emerged from the Prime Vault. Today I’ll be showing you which relics you’ll need to farm to get Ember Prime and where you can farm these relics.
